title: THE END
synopsis: "The light shines down on an object, and it comes into existence. Everything is like that, especially us." What is death? What is an end? Through this 90 mn opera, virtual popstar Hatsune Miku questions the meaning of death. Will she die like a human since she looks like one, or like a machine that dies once the electricity is turned off since she is entirely virtual? What happens after she dies?
background:
THE END is a VOCALOID-based opera that debuted in 2013 at Tokyo's Bunkamura Orchard Hall and Paris’s Théâtre du Châtelet. It later made an appearance at Amsterdam's Dutch National Opera & Ballet in 2015.
Keichiiro composed this virtual opera after the death of his wife.
Music composition is by Keiichiro Shibuya, VOCALOID tuning is handled by PinocchioP, costumes are by Louis Vuitton and graphics are by YKBX.
